title: Verify whether The Regional Control Group should be active as soon as soon as it is assigned to an Event.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Prerequisite:
1.Create a new Regional Control Group for an Organisation
2.Create an event.
3.Assign the RCG to the event in the organisation.
2. Launch PV
3. Login as the user mentioned in prerequisite
4. Naviagte to system setup->Organization administration portal
5. Assign the RCG to the event done in prerequisite.
6. Click on Apply changes
7. Verify whether The Regional Control Group should be active as soon as soon as it is assigned to an Event.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Prerequisite should be met.
2. PV launched successfully.
3. Logged in using the credentials.
4. Organisation page details is shown.
5. RCG  assigned to event.
6. Changes saved.
7. The Regional Control Group should be active as 
soon as soon as it is assigned to an Event.

title: Verify the attending patron is not changed during sales transaction when creating a new patron in cart which violate RCG and a patron already exists in cart.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch PV and login using valid credentials.
2. Create an RCG with include option set - GRCG in Perf (Country: USA, State: IL, Postal code: 68803)
3. Create an Event â€“ GRCGEVT1 with supplier(Arts) owned by Perf
4. Assign GRCG to event GRCGEVT1 created above
5. Create a patron(173930) with address within Regional Control Group GRCG (Country: USA, State: IL, Postal code: 
68803)
6. Navigate to Ticket sales and select event GRCGEVT1 and patron 173930
7. Lock 2 seats and navigate to cart
8. Click on NEW and Enter the primary address not matching GRCG â€“ (Country: USA, State: IL, Postal code: 68802)
9. Click on Apply Changes
10. Click Set Later in INFORMED CONSENT modal and 
Select Delivery method and APPLY
11. Navigate to Delivery tab > Deliveries and Click Edit
12. Navigate to Payments tab and Select payment 
method and Accept Payment
13. Checkout
14. Verify the delivery details
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. User should be logged in successfully
2. user should be able to create RCG successfully
3. User should be able to create event successfully
4. User should be able to associate RCG to the event successfully
5. User should be able to create patron successfully
6. user should be able to navigate to ticket sales and select the event and patron successfully
7. user should be navigated to cart successfully
8. User should be able to create another patron successfully
9. Validation Message should be display
10. User should be able to select the delivery method successfully
11. Existing patron should be display
12. user should be able to select the payment method successfully
13. Transaction should be completed successfully
14. Attending patron should not be changed.
